item.title: Zones
item.description: Custom Rules for Zones in the Campaign Setting Ah, the Zones. They are what remains of a world fractured and scarred, places with their own set of rules, and each one a harsh master.

item.title: Potion-Based Magic (5e)
item.description: Potion-Based Magic Rules for the World OK neophyte, even if you don't want to take up the Craft, you should know a thing or two about potions. Sure you may have had someone who could mix up a draught or grind out a poultice back home.

item.title: Blizzard of 1888
item.description: Blizzard of 1888 The Blizzard of 1888 is remembered as one of the most devastating natural disasters in Watashuka's history. In January 1888, a sudden and violent snowstorm swept across the region, burying homes, freezing livestock, and leaving the town struggling for survival.
